claim: Odin was known in Old English as Wōden.

claim: Akbar was the ruler of the Mughal empire.
LM: Abu ` l-Fath Jalal-ud-din Muhammad ( 15 October 1542 - 27 October 1605 ) , popularly known as Akbar I ( literally " the great " ) and later Akbar the Great , was the third Mughal emperor , who reigned from 1556 to 1605 . The Mughal emperors were a branch of the Timurid dynasty . From the early 16th century to the early 18th they built and ruled the Mughal Empire on the Indian subcontinent , mainly corresponding to the modern countries of Bangladesh , India and Pakistan .
